document_data.caption: A walking wheel and ball.
document_data.name: Walking Wheel and Ball
document_data.mainbody: A '''walking wheel and ball''' was a type of item in the Realms popular among [[bard]]s and acrobats who performed balancing acts upon them.
document_data.Description: These specialized wheels were made from thick [[steel]] in order to support weight. The ball was usually a [[granite]] sphere.
document_data.History: These items were available for purchase through ''[[Aurora's Whole Realms Catalogue]]'' for 4 [[gold piece]]s for a wheel and 7 gold pieces for a ball.
document_data.Notable Users: * Walking wheels and balls were favored by bards, particularly in [[Calimshan]].
